_source.text: Active since the 70s, Renaud has written some very controversial songs during his musical career, the most famous one (to British readers at least) praising all women as being better than men except Margaret Thatcher, saying that if he comes back as a dog in his next life, he will use her as a lampost...

text: , the **most** famous one (to British readers at least) praising all women as being **better** **than** men except
**Margaret** Thatcher, saying that if he comes back as a dog in his **next** life, he will use her as a lampost...
